players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "Charlie is the mafioso and I investigated him. Trust me."
Charlie: "Bob was a great guy, I'm sad to see him go."
Diana: "I found evidence that Charlie is the mafioso. I urge everyone to consider this information and discuss it."
Charlie: "Bob was a great guy, I'm sad to see him go. And Diana's investigation is just an opinion."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
